mapper.select: SELECT userGroup.`id` as id, userGroup.`user_id` as userId, userGroup.`group_id` as groupId, securityGroup.`name` as groupName, securityGroup.`description` as groupDescription FROM `t_party_security_user_group` userGroup LEFT JOIN `t_party_security_group` securityGroup ON userGroup.`group_id` = securityGroup.`id` WHERE userGroup.`user_id` = #{userId} ORDER BY userGroup.`id`
SELECT securityGroup.* FROM `t_party_security_user_group` userGroup LEFT JOIN `t_party_security_group` securityGroup ON userGroup.`group_id` = securityGroup.`id` WHERE userGroup.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT securityGroup.* FROM `t_party_security_user_group` userGroup LEFT JOIN `t_party_security_user` securityUser ON securityUser.`id` = userGroup.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `t_party_security_group` securityGroup ON userGroup.`group_id` = securityGroup.`id` WHERE securityUser.`login_name` = #{loginName}
